events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product just doesn't meet my expectations at all.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with the received product.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and reason for the refund?
To process your refund efficiently, may I know if the product is unused and if you still have the original packaging?
The order number is 123456789. The product was opened but unused, and I still have the box and all the original items inside it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process. Please send the product back within 7 days using the return label I will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help in resolving this smoothly.
Your refund has been processed successfully as soon as we received the returned product. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
We are checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with our service.
As we haven’t heard back from you, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime for further assistance.
